original_text: They brought Uriah out of Egypt and took him to King Jehoiakim, who had him struck down with a sword and his body thrown into the burial place of the common people.)
korean_text: 그들이 우리야를 애굽에서 연행하여 여호야김 왕에게로 그를 데려오매 왕이 칼로 그를 죽이고 그의 시체를 평민의 묘지에 던지게 하니라

sentences.original_text: They brought Uriah out of Egypt
and took him to King Jehoiakim
who had him struck down with a sword
and his body thrown into the burial place
